company info:
Handicare offers solutions and support to increase the independence of disabled or elderly people as well as to improve the convenience of those who are caring for them. It is our mission to make everyday life easier. Handicare uses a ERP system to control all the organizations. The package supports all departments like sales, purchasing, finance, production and even the HRM department. Handicare has organizations in Norway, Sweden, Denmark, United Kingdom, Netherlands, Germany, Canada, China, United states and France. The complete Handicare companies will integrate to one system AX 2012 where all the products will be added into the new system.

Function: 
Working for the global ICT department to maintain database integrity, sales and production configurator, adjusting or creating new tables, forms and reports in the current system to improve the process of Handicare. Also maintaining the daily questions of the old system AX 3.0 and active in team implementing AX 2012. Main responsible for the security of AX 2012, SSRS reporting with Visual Studio, deployment of projects several instances and data migration thru DMF or Atlas.
 
Achieved: 
- Implemented the CRM module together with the field sales people, 
- Implemented a stable and easy to maintain sales and production configurator 
- Implemented a price list module in de ERP system together with marketing department
- Implemented a discount module for sales to set discounts and price agreements on options and basic settings together with customer service department

Currently objectives: 
Implementation of AX2012 for the whole Handicare organizations together with a team business sponcers, process leads and Key users
- Setup and maintenance of the security for the complete organization
- Main developer for GAPs in DEV-TEST-UAT-LIVE thru AOT/TFS and Visual Studio
- SQL maintenance
- Key group configurator decision for go live production organization [Testing and advizing]

profile_positions.description:
Company info: 
Company produces digital storage units to backup information digital on tapes. First a department of Philips but was repelled in 1998 and named OnStream. It contained 4 production facilities in Eindhoven. A cleanroom [3 shifts] which created  the digital heads, machining department which sliced the wafers in digital heads, assembly to make the digital ready for reading and writing data and last the module department where a unit was created to sell in the market.
Function: 
Production manager of the module [15 persons], assembly [30 persons] and machining [12 persons] departments to start a short cycle department to improve the outcomes of the departments. In the beginning to refine the Engineering process to a production process and later to set a better target for all the departments. In 2000 changed to production manager of the wafer fabrication [3 shifts] production [12 persons/shift] and repair and maintenance personal [5 persons/shift] to improve the department. 
Achieved: 
- Stable departments of final assemblies and setting target to accomplish the sales. 
- Managed a good reliability and uptime of 95% of machineries,
- Stable production and repair and maintenance department, 
- Lean and mean to accomplish a better understanding between Engineering, Production and repair and maintenance, 
- Mean Time Between Failure reduced to 80% in spite of old machinery, 
- ISO 9001 certificate, 
- Implementing together with outsourced company the ERP system MFGPro, 
- Back-up of Engineer VAX terminal [traceability system at the wafer fabrication]
